name: Lamp Man Down
description: "Lamp Man Down" is a casual action game that bombs bounce around and golems are blown away. In this game, selling points of a previous work “Golem Rush” is polished up significantly.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows 10 Home 1803 Processor: Intel(R) Core(TM) i7-6700 CPU @ 3.40GHz 3.40GHz Memory: 16 GB RAM
